useful_title: Classical Mythology: Myth in Antiquity and Today
best_gem_comment: This class is great and exactly as advertised — a fun, engaging way to learn about myths and learn about how to analyze mythology. It was a fun class and a good way to fulfill the Arts gened requirement. Professor Libby is a gem! Super engaging lectures, very accessible, wants her students to succeed, and full of interesting knowledge about mythology! Workload was minimal.

This class is relatively EASY, but BORING! if you want to take a class where the professor talks about her children 25% of the class, then this is the class for you. I think the average mention of kids per lecture is 10. this does not include mentions of other family members, friends, boring stories with no relevance to the subject, or attempts of jokes. The class might be a gem in terms of easy assignments, if you do well on the short papers and put in some effort, it should be an easy A. But is it worth it? the material is not enjoyable and the lectures consists of the professor just talking for an hour and fifteen minutes, once every other lecture she wrote something on the blackboard, but not a single picture, presentation, or anything that made it easy to follow and engaged. I would rather take a more demanding class than Happiness, which did not fulfill my expectations (which was fairly high).
best_gem_comment_short: The class might be a gem in terms of easy assignments, if you do well on the short papers and put in some effort, it should be an easy A.

best_gem_comment: One of those classes that can be a gem if you want but so inspiring to see people putting in so much love into the class! Cool array of films, lectures are excellent, Professor Li is phenomenal, and the creative assignments are so fun to make and watch! Take this class!
best_gem_comment_short: One of those classes that can be a gem if you want but so inspiring to see people putting in so much love into the class!

best_gem_comment: Definitely recommend. Professor McLaughlin is very understanding and knows how stressful Harvard can be. The assignments are relatively easy and pretty fun to complete. Would definitely consider this class a gem
best_gem_comment_short: Would definitely consider this class a gem
